name: init 0
description:
In init 0 you play as a robot who was woken up by the sound of someone turning the light on. As the sleepy robot you are, you would very much like to turn off the light and go back to sleep. Unfortunately you forgot some of your parts, so getting to the switch might prove a bit of a challenge.

You traverse the single level, retrieving items until you finally are able to get to the switch.

CONTROLS

A & D for horizontal movement

W for jumping

E for interacting (using items)

F for toggling fullscreen

R for restarting the game (I'm sorry to anyone who accidentally restarts)

This game was made for the first Farewell north game jam

There are a lot of things I would have done differently / included but - as it often is with jams - I ended up in time pressure on the last day. I'm especially sad I didn't get to do menus, and a lot of the artwork I wanted to. I hope you enjoy the ideas anyway.
